questions.question: If something is bothering you, you should?

choices.answer: Wait and see if it resolves itself
Bring it up and work it out
Ignore it, bringing it up would be hard
Get mad they should know what's wrong

questions.question: You see a text from someone you don't like on your friend's phone ...

choices.answer: Ask them about it
Go through their phone
Text the person and call them out
Do nothing

questions.question: Ways to support an abused friend

choices.answer: Listen to them
Don't judge
Offer to help them get help
All of the above

questions.question: How do you respect your friend/BF/GF's space

choices.answer: Only talking to them at school not after
Waiting until they text you first
Hang out Mon-Fri but not weekends
Not always being together but always having their back

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT true about trust in a relationship

choices.answer: Trust is automatic
Trust builds as people learn more about each other
You must be honest to earn trust
Trust is believing in your partner

questions.question: Which is a characteristic of a co-dependent relationship?

choices.answer: Extreme need for approval and recognition
Exaggerated sense of responsibility for actions of others
A tendency to do more than their fair share
All of the above

questions.question: Warning sign of an abusive relationship?

choices.answer: Partner starts to isolate you and keep you from your friends
Your partner wont hold your hand at         school
Partner doesn't want to go to the school dance with you
Your partner wont snapchat you

questions.question: A sign of a healthy relationship is?

choices.answer: You can speak your mind in front of them
Your friends like them
They want to be with you all the time
They get upset if you spend time without them
They should apologize
Look at how you can fix the relationship
Never talk to them again
Ignore it

questions.question: Which kind of love is this statement depicting? "If you love me I will love you back"

choices.answer: Conditional Love
Unconditional Love
